'''Window Clippings''' is a windows-only software that allows the user to precisely capture the transparency (alpha channel) of a window, including the shadow (in windows vista). It used to be freeware, but from version 2.0.28 onwards, it watermarks the screenshots, making it "demoware".
'''Window Clippings''' is a windows-only software that allows the user to precisely capture the transparency (alpha channel) of a window, including the shadow (in windows vista). It used to be freeware, but from version 2.0.28 onwards, it watermarks the screenshots, making it "demoware".
